entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
